title: Crash-test cockroaches inspire wall-climbing robot
text:
Crash-test cockroaches inspire wall-climbing robot 1:02pm BST - 01:57 
The cockroach's ability to quickly switch from walking on the ground to climbing a wall is helping scientists develop fast-reaction robots able to change direction and climb over obstacles without relying on complex and expensive sensors.   cockroach's ability to quickly switch from walking on the ground to climbing a wall is helping scientists develop fast-reaction robots able to change direction and climb over obstacles without relying on complex and expensive sensors.  //reut.rs/2q67zrX
